meanings.definition: Resembling an elephant in size or shape.
meanings.sent1: The elephantine toy in the store was as big as a small car.
meanings.sent2: The elephantine creature lumbered through the forest with ease.
meanings.sent3: The elephantine cake on the table was too big for anyone to finish.
meanings.sent4: The elephantine clouds in the sky seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent5: The elephantine mountain loomed in the distance, casting a shadow over the valley.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of an elephant.
meanings.sent1: The zookeeper studied the elephantine behavior of the herd.
meanings.sent2: The elephantine ears of the animal flapped gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The elephantine trumpet sound echoed through the jungle, startling the birds.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was elephantine, never forgetting a single detail.
meanings.sent5: The elephantine footsteps of the giant creature shook the ground as it walked.
